snippet: Phil Mickelson birdied the first playoff hole to beat Branden Grace and win the Scottish Open in Inverness, ending his 20-year wait for a victory in Europe.
abstract: Phil Mickelson birdies first playoff hole to beat Branden Grace and win Scottish Open in Inverness, ending his 20-year wait for a victory in Europe; other golf news noted.
lead_paragraph: Phil Mickelson birdied the first playoff hole to beat Branden Grace and win the Scottish Open in Inverness, ending his 20-year wait for a victory in Europe.

headline.main: Mickelson Prevails in Playoff at Scottish Open
